job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
**Fully remote Developer/Engineer Opportunities**


Title: React/Angular Front End Developer

Full Stack Developer (Java & JavaScript OR .NET & JavaScript)

Back End Engineer (Java, Node or .NET)

LOCATION: Remote

PAY RATE: Market Rate


QUALIFICATIONS

  • Bachelor Degree in Computer Science, Engineering (or similar degree program) is a must!
  • 3+ years' experience developing API's (REST API's) and building out microservices.
  • 3+ years of backend programming experience with Java, Python and/or Go (we are open for any of the above listed OOP languages).
  • 3+ years of React or Angular Development


OVERVIEW

Insight Global is hiring several Software Engineer positions nationwide. If any of the above qualifications fit your background we would love to connect further.
